title: My Expertise
detail_text: <:th_ch0003/>Rina-chan, thank you~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’m glad I was able to fix it. Rina-chan’s board「Smile」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>This earphone is my favorite, so I’m happy that I can still use it<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>If it starts to break again…. tell me. I love to tinker with stuff like these…. it’s something I’m good at<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Okay, thanks! Ah, Rina-chan, can you wait for a bit? I baked an apple pie as a thank you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Apple pie? I’d love it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Fufu, I’m good at making sweets, so♪ I’m returning the favor for your expertise with my expertise<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>When I do something I’m good at…. I’ll get that person’s expertise in return.... That’s kind of…. amazing. If it’s between 2 people, then there will be 2 good things<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>That’s right. If it’s 3 people, then it’s 3, and if it’s 4 people, then it’s 4. It may be even more than that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Being connected with people…. gives you so many wonderful things!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
